page.title: 05COLINDALE HOSPITAL
page.content: Colindale is a sub-regional hospital, that is part of the Barnet District Health Organisation. Other hospitals that make up the group to provide a comprehensive health service for the area are Barnet and Edgware General Hospital and Hendon District Hospital.Colindale Hospital has 220 beds; 31 for Ear, Nose and Throat; 27 for Thoracic; 10 Intensive Care beds and 130 for Pscho/geriatric patients. The hospital has two Operating Theatres for Thoracic surgery and one for E.N.T. surgery. There are two Radiology units and a Physiotherapy facility. The running cost of the Hospital in 1985 is Â£4.5 million. Currently there are 350 staff. The hospital will be developed shortly to specialise in the care of geriatric residential and day patients.
